name: needle-haystack-challenge-
description: [![Watch the video](https://img.youtube.com/vi/hOF3COhAol4/maxresdefault.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hOF3COhAol4) This project provides a simple web application to exercise your automation skills by finding the needle in a haystack of dropdown options. The application is containerized using Docker and can be easily deployed using Docker Compose.
